Now the entire franchise has gone to the land of Stepford, where everybody is so nice and sweet and happy and zippy, you feel a cavity coming on. Steven Tyler is "about as critical as a fourth-grade music teacher," while Jennifer Lopez , trying to fill the sympathetic Paula Abdul role, supposedly has trouble saying no, but "even this feels manufactured" and disingenous.

, toward how we undermine women's reproductive health," said Barbara Boxer Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.). Abortion-rights groups, mobilizing to combat efforts to limit reproductive services, hammered home that same point. The House leadership is clearly out of touch with the American people, as they are continuing to focus on legislation that takes away healthcare women currently have instead of focusing on jobs and the economy, said Cecile Mike Pence , president of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America. Eric Cantor said Republicans are trying to make good on a "Pledge to America" promise by cutting taxpayer funding for abortion.

coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called "adult supervision" for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,

Earlier today, Kara DioGuardi spoke candidly about her experience on the show that thrust the widely unknown songwriter into the blinding spotlight of one of the most successful series in television history. It was a real learning curve for me-- not only was I judging talent on the spot, but I was learning how to be a TV personality, Kara DioGuardi said. running back Michael Vick Turner and wide receiver Roddy White , the Falcons were everywhere in the NFC's 55-41 Pro Bowl victory on Sunday, a game that never was as close as that final score would indicate. The Falcons were well represented today, Tony Gonzalez said in an understatement. Atlanta had the best regular-season record in the NFC at 13-3 but was embarrassed at home 48-21 by the Green Bay Packers in the divisional playoffs. Still, the Falcons' previous success

Corporation is transforming audiences and dazzling critics with its insightful and compelling analysis. Taking its status as a legal "person" to the logical conclusion, the film puts the corporation on the psychiatrist's couch to ask What kind of person is it? The Corporation includes interviews with 40 corporate insiders and critics- including Noam Chomsky , Naomi Klein , Milton Friedman , Howard Zinn , Vandana Shiva and Michael Vick Moore- plus true confessions, case studies and strategies for change.
